reviewText:
McCarthy is a character, I like some of his views and knowledge. I have gone through years of figuring out the application of Kata. My teacher is an amazing martial artist but typical of these guys think everything in Karate is about punching and kicking and have no clue what the meanings of the moves are but punching and kicking.
I have traveled to Japan and Okinawa and they are clueless unless its Goju styles that actually have more knowledge of Bunkai in there kata.
